product_name: The North Face Sprout Pack - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For 2 - 4 year olds, The North Face Sprout pack allows kids to carry their own gear, and features a convenient handle on the pack's face so parents can put the brakes on overzealous little explorers. Shoulder straps are sized and shaped specifically for a small child's frame; easy-to-use sternum strap complements the shoulder strap posture. Main compartment features a convenient internal mesh organizer pocket. Side mesh pockets hold water bottles or snacks. The North Face Sprout pack features a reflective light loop for enhanced visibility (safety light not included). Closeout.
short_description: For 2 - 4 year olds, The North Face Sprout pack allows kids to carry their own gear, and features a convenient handle on the pack's face so parents can put the brakes on overzealous little explorers.
